document_data.name: Piton
document_data.mainbody: A '''piton''', also called a '''[[spike]]''', was a tool that could be wedged into a crevice of a rock in order to support a climber.
document_data.Description: Pitons were specialized [[iron]] or [[steel]] spikes with an eyehole for attaching a [[rope]], [[carabiner]], or other device.
document_data.Usage:
In order to be effective, pitons had to be [[hammer]]ed into the surfaces of walls so that they were secure. They were used in combination with ropes, which were connected to the climber's body. If used correctly, pitons would shorten the distance that one would fall, should they accidentally slip. [[Maztica]], and even other locations across [[Realmspace]].

As large and durable metal [[nail]]s, pitons could also be used by [[adventurer]]s to spike a door shut.
document_data.Availability: * The [[Iron Bull Smithy]] in [[Ravens Bluff]] sold pitons for 8 [[silver piece]]s per {{SI|1|lb|k}}.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/103/The Living City: The Horse Businesses|16}}
document_data.Notable Pitons: * ''[[Prismal's piton]]'', a [[magic]]al tool invented by [[Prismal the Outrageous|Prismal]]. Once pushed into an object, ''Prismal's pitons'' would never detach, unless the owner spoke a [[command word]].
document_data.Notable Owner:
* [[Joel]] the Rebel Bard and a [[priest]] [[Finder Wyvernspur]] carried climbing gear, ropes, and pitons among his adventuring gear in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
* [[Salla Pitontoes]] was the proprietor of [[Cloud Peaks Outfitters]] in [[Nashkel]]. She sold special climbing supplies, from ''[[ring of feather falling|rings of feather falling]]'' to [[spidersilk]] [[rope]]s.
